name: Block Breaker (UnknownSunshine)
description:
Hey !

My name's Shahar Palensya, and I am just starting to pave my way as a game developer ! 

You can probably see that art isn't necessarily my strong side, but making games has always been my dream.

I am posting this here for feedback, criticism and bug report (?) 

Thank you for helping me  make my dream come true !

Please feel free to contact me with suggestions and feed back, 
fwnsvuser@gmail.com

:)
